descript.abstract: Polygon data displaying the Town of Oakville Wards (2018 Term of Office). While the municipal election will be run based on the news wards, the new wards do not come into effect until December 1, 2018.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: The administrative divisions of the Town of Oakville that elects and is represented by a councilor.
A description of the geographic boundary for each ward.
Length of feature in internal units.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
